meanings.sent1: The misbegotten idea led to a failed project.
meanings.sent2: The misbegotten plan resulted in chaos.
meanings.sent3: His misbegotten attempt at cooking left the kitchen in a mess.
meanings.sent4: The misbegotten decision to drive without a map got us hopelessly lost.
meanings.sent5: The misbegotten strategy proved to be a complete disaster.

meanings.sent1: The misbegotten child faced challenges due to his uncertain parentage.
meanings.sent2: The misbegotten puppy was abandoned on the street.
meanings.sent3: The misbegotten heir to the throne caused a stir in the royal family.
meanings.sent4: The misbegotten treasure was rumored to be cursed.
meanings.sent5: The misbegotten document raised suspicions about its authenticity.

meanings.definition: having a disreputable or improper origin
meanings.sent1: The misbegotten rumor spread quickly through the town.
meanings.sent2: The misbegotten business deal turned out to be a scam.
meanings.sent3: The misbegotten painting was suspected to be a forgery.
meanings.sent4: The misbegotten alliance between the two countries was doomed from the start.
meanings.sent5: The misbegotten friendship ended in betrayal.
